bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
The wt-devel package does not contain FindWt.cmake file. It is required to build cmake projects that use Wt. It seems that this file was included in the package, but have been removed in version 3.3.5-0.1: http://pkgs.fedoraproject.org/cgit/rpms/wt.git/commit/wt.spec?id=e7d21663e7c36829505e2909a53c84868816bb85 I believe this was done by mistake.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
3.3.6-1.fc25
How reproducible:
always
Steps to Reproduce:
1. rpm -ql wt-devel | grep cmake
Actual results:
No output.
Expected results:
/usr/share/cmake/Modules/FindWt.cmake
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 26 development cycle. Changing version to '26'.
wt-3.3.7-1.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-83eae8064d
wt-3.3.7-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-7bc65f8751
Thank you for the report. It's been fixed. Sorry for the delay.

wt-3.3.7-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-7bc65f8751

wt-3.3.7-1.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-83eae8064d
wt-3.3.7-1.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
